param.para: Pointer to a value that indicates the x-axis aspect ratio.

param.name: plAspectY

summary.para: The IBasicVideo2 interface extends the interface. The Video Renderer filter and Video Mixing Renderer filters implement this interface, but the interface is exposed to applications through the Filter Graph Manager.
